name: Weekly Survival Challenge
info: Test your survival skills in the weekly wilderness challenge.
dialogs: Survivor! Ready for this week's ultimate challenge?
The wilderness arena has been reset with new dangers.
You'll face waves of increasingly difficult enemies.
Resources are scarce - you must scavenge to survive.
The environment itself will try to kill you.
Only the strongest survive the full seven days.
Do you have what it takes to be a champion?
